feed.title: 分类：回忆篇 | 南雅ers在广东

entry.title: 「回忆篇」国际张、喜感帝怒对歌《套马杆》
entry.content:
<iframe id="video" src="http://www.tudou.com/programs/view/html5embed.action?type=0&code=3yVxwTy2Pg4&lcode=&resourceId=379315028_06_05_99" allowtransparency="true" allowfullscreen="true" allowfullscreenInteractive="true" scrolling="no" border="0" frameborder="0" style="width:100%;" ></iframe>




<script>
    //为了使width:height=6:5
    window.onresize=Init;
    function Init(){
            
        document.getElementById("video").height=""+document.getElementById("video").clientWidth*0.83333+"";
    }  
    Init();
</script>
